high_descs: Turn to the left and move to the wood dresser against the wall to the left of the window.
Pick up the credit card between the black mug and the blue smartphone from the dresser.
Turn left, move towards the door, then turn right and then move to and face the end of the dresser closest to the closet door.
Turn on the table lamp on the dresser between the CD and the pen.
anns.task_desc: Examine a credit card using the light from a table lamp.

high_descs: Turn left and walk towards the dresser.
Pick up the credit card behind the blue cell phone on the dresser.
Turn left, walk past the dresser, and turn right to face the lamp.
Turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Look at a credit card next to the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Turn to the left and face the dresser.
Pick the credit card above the phone up from the dresser.
Go to the end of the dresser and stand on the side near the lamp.
Turn the lamp on.
anns.task_desc: Turn a lamp on with a credit card in hand.

high_descs: Turn left and walk over to the dresser
Pick up the blue credit card from behind the phone
Walk around to the left end of the dresser
Turn on the table lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine the credit card by the light of the table lamp

high_descs: turn left  move forward toward dresser
pick up card next to the phone
turn left move forward turn right once passed the dresser turn right to face the lamp
turn lamp on
anns.task_desc: To pick up a card and turn on the lamp

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the desk.
Pick up the leftmost credit card.
Turn left and walk around the counter.
Turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: View a credit card illuminated by a lamp.
